name: Ships (itch) (Scanax)
description:
Simple 3D game about ships on the high sea exchanging gunfire with each other. Try to destroy the enemy ship before he destroys yours. You can redirect enemy canonballs by shooting them with your cannon and speed up the reloading of your cannon by plaing simple minigame.

Authors

Members of the Science Club Ruch Projektantow Gier from Poznań University of Technology:

  • Naspey - Developer
  • Scanax - Developer
  • Cluy - 3D Graphic Designer
